input.sentences: she walked barefoot among the chickens .
the garden was green and lush .
the roof was made of thatch .
output.sentences: At the farm, Sarah took off her shoes and walked barefoot among the chickens.
She looked to the left and saw a lush, green garden.
Beside it was a goat that grazed contentedly in the grass.
To the right of her was a traditional home with a thatch roof.
Inside they got to see reenactments of the way of life in the past.
